org.springframework.shell

Class CommandLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.shell.CommandLine

  • public class CommandLine
extends Object
    Encapsulates the list of argument passed to the shell.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandLine

        public CommandLine(String[] args,
           int historySize,
           String[] shellCommandsToExecute)
        Construct a new CommandLine
        Parameters:
        args - an array of strings from main(String[] args)
        historySize - the size of this history buffer
        shellCommandsToExecute - semi-colon delimited list of commands for the shell to execute

      • CommandLine

        public CommandLine(String[] args,
           int historySize,
           String[] shellCommandsToExecute,
           boolean disableInternalCommands)
        Construct a new CommandLine
        Parameters:
        args - an array of strings from main(String[] args)
        historySize - the size of this history buffer
        shellCommandsToExecute - semi-colon delimited list of commands for the shell to execute
        disableInternalCommands - if true, do not load the built-in shell commands
